pages.text: The Copper Drill is a machine that drills in a 1x1 area directly below it. It consumes 20FE/tick and mines 1 block every 140 ticks. As a result of the drill being made out of copper, it is unable to mine deepslate. The GUI of the interface details the Y level of the block currently being mined. The light on the right side details the current status of the machines:$(br)Green: Working$(br)Yellow: No power or no space$(br)Red: Drill has hit deepslate, bedrock, or is in the void
An example of an early-game setup for the Copper Drill.
